path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - World of Metasea Token - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Wrong checking in total percentage condition
findings.description: The total percentage checking statement in the updateVestingPlan function of the TokenSale.sol contract is incorrect. The expression 100*percentageDecimals_ should be 10*percentageDecimals_ instead.

findings.title: Hardcoded values in the constructor function
findings.description: The finding highlights hardcoded values used in the constructor function of TokenSale.sol contract.

findings.title: Duplicated batch number checking
findings.description: The finding highlights duplicated batch number checking in TokenSale.sol contract.
